flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: this is the 1st antenna i have built, but i had an experienced ham opperator, and antenna builder behind me for tips. with some everyday junk, and a lot of inginuity, you can buld anantenna for whatever wavelength your broadcasting on.
guide.introduction_rendered: this is the 1st antenna i have built, but i had an experienced ham opperator, and antenna builder behind me for tips. with some everyday junk, and a lot of inginuity, you can buld anantenna for whatever wavelength your broadcasting on.
guide.summary: show how to calculate,build, and use a simple di pole ham radio antenna
guide.title: homemade, simple dipole antenna
